Articles.Content:
Came up with that I might be of use, or would like to join some people who generally work as a team. Something simple, just to share ideas and recent KSP activities with others. I do use mods, though, and have edited a few parts myself, like the Xenongas Engine. It produces 120 thrust, refills the used Xenongas, and still requires a lot of electricity, bad for big vessels. The works.

So, if anybody could possibly think of a clan that would be suited for me, lemme know.

BTW, gotta love the warp drive FractalUK made. Thats one thing I love the most.

Perhaps look here. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forumdisplay.php/52-Rocket-Builders

Probably the closest you are going to find to clans here.

For a game that's singleplayer only, there isn't much of clans. There are people who group together in 'corporations' in the rocket builder forums, but other than that the entire KSP community is one big clan as far as I see it.

this is not another MMORPG bro,

EVE is what you want if you want clans.
Clan Wolverine is somewhere out there protecting the innersphere from all the bug-eyed aliens.

It was a serious question, not me asking about anything even relative to MMORPGs. I hate MMORPGs, and if I wanted to be in a group of people like that, I'd go to one of the crappy ones, like EVE.

I don't even play EVE because it sucks.

Rocket builders is what you want then. There is always someone hiring and they've made some great stuff.

Clan Wolverine is somewhere out there protecting the innersphere from all the bug-eyed aliens.
. I feel so much safer now. Edited September 13, 2013 by BostLabs
